localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
blogPost.body: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
blogPost.title: ZenML - Create reproducible machine learning pipelines
blogPost.author: David Aronchick

localize.description: 有没有花了几个小时训练ML模型，结果却让它们在生产中崩溃和烧毁？ZenML在这里提供帮助。跟踪元数据、比较结果并扩展到云。它是开源的、可扩展的，并且与现成的久经考验的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 创建可重现的机器学习管道

localize.description: 有沒有花了幾個小時訓練ML模型，結果卻讓它們在生產中崩潰和燒燬？ZenML在這裏提供幫助。跟蹤元數據、比較結果並擴展到雲。它是開源的、可擴展的，並且與現成的久經考驗的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 創建可重現的機器學習管道

previous.excerpt: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
previous.title: Explo 2.0 - Customer-facing dashboards and reports - lightning fast

localize.description: Explo可以让您建立面向客户的仪表盘，并无缝地嵌入到您现有的应用程序中。直接连接到您的数据库或仓库，建立自定义风格的仪表盘，并在一天内嵌入您的应用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客户的仪表盘和报告--快如闪电。

localize.description: Explo可以讓您建立面向客戶的儀表盤，並無縫地嵌入到您現有的應用程序中。直接連接到您的數據庫或倉庫，建立自定義風格的儀表盤，並在一天內嵌入您的應用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客戶的儀表盤和報告--快如閃電。
